answers.answer: They will probably make you go to a dietician, if ur gd is no too bad maybe start u off with metformin its a pill and make u check ur sugar every day if its a lil bit higher maybe start u of with low doses of insulin. Just eat healthier drink lots of water! And light exercises and you should be fine :) good luck :)

question: I am 33 almost 34 and diagnosed with gestational diabetes and 30 weeks pregnant with my 2nd child,  my question is what next, and anyone have good results after?
title: Gestational Diabetes Mommy
